ComicInfo.Summary: He's a cop stitched together with three mobsters. He's a giant fighting to uphold the law. He's a monster who can turn the city into a living hell. The Frankenstein Mobster fights a constant inner battle to do the right thing, and he can't win all the time! It's a shootout between the Frankenstein Mobster and the police, and his daughter is one of them. He'd rather die than hurt her, and this time, he just might get the chance. SPECIAL BACK-UP FEATURE: THE BLACK FOREST by Todd Livingston, Robert Tinnell and Neil Vokes. A frightening new story!
ComicInfo.Writer: Mark Wheatley,Todd Livingston,Robert Tinnell,Todd Livingston,Robert Tinnell,Mark Wheatley
ComicInfo.Title: A Bedtime Story
